trans-unit.source: Specifies how <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref> reacts to touch manipulation.
trans-unit.target: Especifica como <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"> </xref> reagir a manipulação de touch.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> will scroll when a user drags a finger on the control on a touch device that supports Windows Touch.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>será, desloque-se quando um utilizador arrasta uma mas o controlo num dispositivo touch que suporta o Windows Touch.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.PanningMode%2A> property specifies whether the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> scroll horizontally, vertically, or both.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.PanningMode%2A>propriedade especifica se o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>deslocar horizontalmente, verticalmente, ou ambos.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.PanningMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref> scrolls when the user moves a finger horizontally first.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"> </xref> desloca quando o utilizador move uma mas horizontalmente primeiro.

trans-unit.source: If the user moves the vertically first, the movement is treated as mouse events.
trans-unit.target: Se o utilizador move verticalmente primeiro, o movimento é tratado como eventos do rato.

trans-unit.source: After the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref> begins to scroll, it will scroll horizontally and vertically.
trans-unit.target: Depois do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"> </xref> começa a desloque-se, irá deslocar horizontal e verticalmente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref> does not respond to touch input.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"> </xref> não responde a entrada de touch.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref> scrolls when the user moves a finger vertically first.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"> </xref> desloca quando o utilizador move uma mas verticalmente primeiro.

trans-unit.source: If the user moves the horizontally first, the movement is treated as mouse events.
trans-unit.target: Se o utilizador move horizontalmente primeiro, o movimento é tratado como eventos do rato.

trans-unit.source: After the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref> begins to scroll, it will scroll horizontally and vertically.
trans-unit.target: Depois do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"> </xref> começa a desloque-se, irá deslocar horizontal e verticalmente.
